content:
Certainly! Here's your updated equipment list:

Starting Equipment:

* A set of artisan's tools (smith's tools, tinker's tools)
* A set of thief's tools
* A light crossbow and 20 bolts
* A sword (part of your right arm)
* Traveler's clothes
* Pouch containing 10 gp

With the addition of the thief's tools, you now have a broader range of tools at your disposal, allowing you to unlock doors, disarm traps, and pick locks. This could be especially useful if your party encounters any locked doors or treasure chests during your adventures.
